name: Icy Mike
description:
Icy Mike is a game in early development. We, the developers, are both 16 years of age and make this game as a part of our big school research project. We hope to receive a lot of feedback, so we can improve our game.
A lot of artwork is on the way. For now, you have to do with the blocky enemies.

Controls are:

WASD to move
space to shoot
1 = Sword / Shield
2 = Pistol
3 = Shotgun
ESC to open menu

In the options menu, you can do the following:
Toggle reset mode, which toggles between:
-You restart on the floor you died on with the weapons you had (OFF)
-You have to restart from the beginning and lose all loot (ON)

Toggle dev mode, which allows you to use your keyboard to summon enemies, upgrade your weapons, or increase/decrease your health. It's up to you to figure out what every key does. (Bottom and middle row of your keyboard and - = [ ] ; )

Change the amount of "normal" chambers on floor generation

Change the difficulty

We'd love to receive feedback from you on this game
